comments.author: ri@yopmail.com
comments.creator: ri@yopmail.com
comments.raw_text: It works in Safe Mode. I disabled plugins and removed extensions besides Feedback 1.0.3 and Google Gears 0.5.36.0

The safemode does a little bit more than disabling the addons.,
Please disable the hardware acceleration in (alt key)tools/options/advanced/general and restart Firefox.

Post the graphic section from about:support here if that fixes your problem.
comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text:
The safemode does a little bit more than disabling the addons.,
Please disable the hardware acceleration in (alt key)tools/options/advanced/general and restart Firefox.

Post the graphic section from about:support here if that fixes your problem.

comments.raw_text:
I'm sure that we will block such old drivers with FF4 final

Can you please upgrade your drivers and try it again with hardware acceleration enabled ?
-> http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/Pages/index.aspx
comments.text:
I'm sure that we will block such old drivers with FF4 final

Can you please upgrade your drivers and try it again with hardware acceleration enabled ?
-> http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/Pages/index.aspx

comments.raw_text: you are getting bug 635463 if you use nightly builds
comments.text: you are getting bug 635463 if you use nightly builds
This looks a lot like bug 635463 - reporters, are you running the Win64 build? If so, please switch to the Win32 build, as the Win64 build isn't supported for Firefox 4.
comments.author: joe@drew.ca
comments.creator: joe@drew.ca
